scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Collection of studio portraits by Brooklyn photographers contains 21 black-and-white studio portraits taken at Brooklyn photographic studios, circa 1870 to 1930. The majority of the collection consists of cabinet photographs. The sitters in the portraits are unidentified, though each photograph includes the name of the photographer or the photographic studio that created the photograph. The address of the studio is often included as well.
